product_name: Mission Athletecare EnduraCool Instant Cooling Towel - X-Large
long_description: Made from a proprietary performance fabric that quickly cools when wet, the X-large Mission EnduraCoolTM Instant Cooling towel helps regulate your body temperature after hard-charging activities.
short_description: Made from a proprietary performance fabric that quickly cools when wet, the X-large Mission EnduraCoolTM Instant Cooling towel helps regulate your body temperature after hard-charging activities.
